entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
